record.description: University of Chicago Track Team, 1910. Fourth row: N. B. Johnson (trainer), Amos Alonzo Stagg (coach), and Norman Barker (assistant coach); third row: Donald Tillinghast Grey, Millington Farwell Carpenter, Oscar William Worthwine, Harold Cushman Gifford, Morris Fishbein, Matthias S. Gerend, and William Henry Kuh; second row: Esmond Ray Long, Virgil Orville Whipp, Ira Nelson Davenport, Walter Phillips Comstock (captain), William Lucas Crawley, James Austin Menaul, and Donald Stirling Stophlet; first row: Robert Witt Baird, Samuel Edwin Earle, Alfred Heckman Straube, and Rufus Boynton Rogers.
record.publisher: University of Chicago Library, Special Collections Research Center
